column1: Little Goat Diner////Disclaimer: Do not come here if you are on a diet!  That said
column2: this place is phenomenal.  Little Goat fully embodies the comfortable and friendly diner feel that they are going for...and beautifully combines it with modern and ingenious creations
column4: and a very chic vibe.  The food is reasonably priced for the quality and unique dishes that are offered.  Chef Steph has added a very strong Korean/Asian influence to many of the offerings and even the weirder sounding fusion items are blended amazingly.
